Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/Vulois:::

::My Keepers have realized that their former allies are not coming back.  
They have been wandering, searching for someone to help them.  They soon come 
upon the Chivtron base.  They cannot beleive thier eyes, when they see Vulois 
standing outside::
Windrazor: Vulois?! But how?
Terradive: But you're- we thought you were-
Gigatron: Dead!
::Vulois turns around and sees his old comrades.  They looked different, but 
he recognized them::
Vulois: I actually faked death so i could be free of the war.  It didn't 
work.  Battera and Dachande are never coming back.
Afterburner: We are in the same situation.  Herald and the others are gone 
for good.
Vulois: im sad to hear that they have departed.  But i think it's time we 
left, too.
::They see that Thundercracker is with him::
Terradive: Who's this?
Vulois: This is my friend Thundercracker.  Thundercracker, these are my old 
friends.  They are leaving the planet.  Ive decided im going to.  I would be 
honored to have you join us.  Will you escape the war with us?

--part1_37.14acd628.28299fc4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
